title: New: The Japanese House – Face Like Thunder
body:
I caught **The Japanese House** live for the first time earlier this year and it was a near transcendental experience.

There are few artists around right now able to conjure up a such a phenomenal level of tangible beauty in their music, and whilst her latest track, _Face Like Thunder_, finds the songwriting taking a more outwardly accessible turn, the intricacies are no less dazzling. It’s the sound of desolation, of inner torment, yet ultimately, of redeemable hope.

_“You’re sentenced to death and you can’t be reprieved.”_

_Face Like Thunder_ is lifted from her forthcoming third EP, Swim Against The Tide, out 11 November via Dirty Hit. Check it out below.
